H0.text: Who were the backing group of Junior Walker. The Funk Brothers

H1.text: Who were the backing group of Junior Walker. The Memphis Horns

H2.text: Who were the backing group of Junior Walker. The Crusaders

H3.text: Who were the backing group of Junior Walker. AllSTARS

A4.text: The Funk Brothers were the backing group for Motown recordings from 1959 until 1972.

A5.text: The text does not mention Junior Walker or any association between him and the Funk Brothers, Memphis Horns, Crusaders, or AllSTARS.
